play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: 'Tis thought, Lord Talbot, when the fight began,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Roused on the sudden from their drowsy beds,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: They did amongst the troops of armed men
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Leap o'er the walls for refuge in the field.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Myself, as far as I could well discern
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: For smoke and dusky vapours of the night,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Am sure I scared the Dauphin and his trull,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: When arm in arm they both came swiftly running,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Like to a pair of loving turtle-doves
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: That could not live asunder day or night.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: After that things are set in order here,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: We'll follow them with all the power we have.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: All hail, my lords! which of this princely train
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Call ye the warlike Talbot, for his acts
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: So much applauded through the realm of France?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Here is the Talbot: who would speak with him?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: The virtuous lady, Countess of Auvergne,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: With modesty admiring thy renown,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: By me entreats, great lord, thou wouldst vouchsafe
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: To visit her poor castle where she lies,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: That she may boast she hath beheld the man
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Whose glory fills the world with loud report.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Is it even so? Nay, then, I see our wars
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Will turn unto a peaceful comic sport,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: When ladies crave to be encounter'd with.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: You may not, my lord, despise her gentle suit.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Ne'er trust me then; for when a world of men
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Could not prevail with all their oratory,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Yet hath a woman's kindness over-ruled:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: And therefore tell her I return great thanks,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: And in submission will attend on her.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Will not your honours bear me company?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: No, truly; it is more than manners will:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: And I have heard it said, unbidden guests
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Are often welcomest when they are gone.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Well then, alone, since there's no remedy,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: I mean to prove this lady's courtesy.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Come hither, captain.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: You perceive my mind?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: I do, my lord, and mean accordingly.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Orleans. Within the town.

line_text: Porter, remember what I gave in charge;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: And when you have done so, bring the keys to me.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Madam, I will.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: The plot is laid: if all things fall out right,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: I shall as famous be by this exploit
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: As Scythian Tomyris by Cyrus' death.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Great is the rumor of this dreadful knight,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: And his achievements of no less account:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Fain would mine eyes be witness with mine ears,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: To give their censure of these rare reports.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Madam,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: According as your ladyship desired,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: By message craved, so is Lord Talbot come.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: And he is welcome. What! is this the man?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Madam, it is.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Is this the scourge of France?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Is this the Talbot, so much fear'd abroad
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: That with his name the mothers still their babes?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: I see report is fabulous and false:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: I thought I should have seen some Hercules,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: A second Hector, for his grim aspect,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: And large proportion of his strong-knit limbs.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Alas, this is a child, a silly dwarf!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: It cannot be this weak and writhled shrimp
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Should strike such terror to his enemies.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Madam, I have been bold to trouble you;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: But since your ladyship is not at leisure,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: I'll sort some other time to visit you.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: What means he now? Go ask him whither he goes.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Stay, my Lord Talbot; for my lady craves
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: To know the cause of your abrupt departure.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Marry, for that she's in a wrong belief,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: I go to certify her Talbot's here.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: If thou be he, then art thou prisoner.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Prisoner! to whom?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: To me, blood-thirsty lord;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: And for that cause I trained thee to my house.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Long time thy shadow hath been thrall to me,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: For in my gallery thy picture hangs:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: But now the substance shall endure the like,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: And I will chain these legs and arms of thine,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: That hast by tyranny these many years
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Wasted our country, slain our citizens
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: And sent our sons and husbands captivate.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Ha, ha, ha!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Laughest thou, wretch? thy mirth shall turn to moan.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: I laugh to see your ladyship so fond
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: To think that you have aught but Talbot's shadow
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Whereon to practise your severity.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Why, art not thou the man?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: I am indeed.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Then have I substance too.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: No, no, I am but shadow of myself:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: You are deceived, my substance is not here;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: For what you see is but the smallest part
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: And least proportion of humanity:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: I tell you, madam, were the whole frame here,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: It is of such a spacious lofty pitch,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Your roof were not sufficient to contain't.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: This is a riddling merchant for the nonce;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: He will be here, and yet he is not here:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: How can these contrarieties agree?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: That will I show you presently.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: How say you, madam? are you now persuaded
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: That Talbot is but shadow of himself?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: These are his substance, sinews, arms and strength,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: With which he yoketh your rebellious necks,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Razeth your cities and subverts your towns
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: And in a moment makes them desolate.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Victorious Talbot! pardon my abuse:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: I find thou art no less than fame hath bruited
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: And more than may be gather'd by thy shape.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Let my presumption not provoke thy wrath;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: For I am sorry that with reverence
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: I did not entertain thee as thou art.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Be not dismay'd, fair lady; nor misconstrue
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: The mind of Talbot, as you did mistake
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: The outward composition of his body.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: What you have done hath not offended me;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Nor other satisfaction do I crave,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: But only, with your patience, that we may
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Taste of your wine and see what cates you have;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: For soldiers' stomachs always serve them well.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: With all my heart, and think me honoured
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: To feast so great a warrior in my house.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.

line_text: Great lords and gentlemen, what means this silence?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Dare no man answer in a case of truth?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Within the Temple-hall we were too loud;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The garden here is more convenient.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Then say at once if I maintain'd the truth;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or else was wrangling Somerset in the error?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Faith, I have been a truant in the law,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And never yet could frame my will to it;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And therefore frame the law unto my will.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Judge you, my Lord of Warwick, then, between us.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Between two hawks, which flies the higher pitch;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Between two dogs, which hath the deeper mouth;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Between two blades, which bears the better temper:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Between two horses, which doth bear him best;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Between two girls, which hath the merriest eye;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I have perhaps some shallow spirit of judgement;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But in these nice sharp quillets of the law,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Good faith, I am no wiser than a daw.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Tut, tut, here is a mannerly forbearance:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The truth appears so naked on my side
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That any purblind eye may find it out.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And on my side it is so well apparell'd,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So clear, so shining and so evident
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That it will glimmer through a blind man's eye.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Since you are tongue-tied and so loath to speak,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: In dumb significants proclaim your thoughts:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Let him that is a true-born gentleman
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And stands upon the honour of his birth,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If he suppose that I have pleaded truth,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: From off this brier pluck a white rose with me.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Let him that is no coward nor no flatterer,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But dare maintain the party of the truth,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Pluck a red rose from off this thorn with me.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I love no colours, and without all colour
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Of base insinuating flattery
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I pluck this white rose with Plantagenet.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I pluck this red rose with young Somerset
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And say withal I think he held the right.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Stay, lords and gentlemen, and pluck no more,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Till you conclude that he upon whose side
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The fewest roses are cropp'd from the tree
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Shall yield the other in the right opinion.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Good Master Vernon, it is well objected:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If I have fewest, I subscribe in silence.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And I.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Then for the truth and plainness of the case.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I pluck this pale and maiden blossom here,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Giving my verdict on the white rose side.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Prick not your finger as you pluck it off,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lest bleeding you do paint the white rose red
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And fall on my side so, against your will.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If I my lord, for my opinion bleed,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Opinion shall be surgeon to my hurt
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And keep me on the side where still I am.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Well, well, come on: who else?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Unless my study and my books be false,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The argument you held was wrong in you:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: In sign whereof I pluck a white rose too.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Now, Somerset, where is your argument?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As witting I no other comfort have.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Richard Plantagenet, my friend, is he come?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Ay, noble uncle, thus ignobly used,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Your nephew, late despised Richard, comes.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: That I may kindly give one fainting kiss.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Being but fourth of that heroic line.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: From famous Edmund Langley, Duke of York,

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Marrying my sister that thy mother was,

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Again in pity of my hard distress
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: And have install'd me in the diadem:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: But, as the rest, so fell that noble earl
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Of which, my lord, your honour is the last.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: True; and thou seest that I no issue have
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: And that my fainting words do warrant death;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Thou art my heir; the rest I wish thee gather:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: But yet be wary in thy studious care.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Thy grave admonishments prevail with me:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: But yet, methinks, my father's execution

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Was nothing less than bloody tyranny.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: With silence, nephew, be thou politic:

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Strong-fixed is the house of Lancaster,

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: And like a mountain, not to be removed.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: As princes do their courts, when they are cloy'd

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: With long continuance in a settled place.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: O, uncle, would some part of my young years
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Might but redeem the passage of your age!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Thou dost then wrong me, as that slaughterer doth
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Which giveth many wounds when one will kill.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Mourn not, except thou sorrow for my good;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Only give order for my funeral:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: And so farewell, and fair be all thy hopes
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: And prosperous be thy life in peace and war!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: And peace, no war, befall thy parting soul!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: In prison hast thou spent a pilgrimage
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: And like a hermit overpass'd thy days.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Well, I will lock his counsel in my breast;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: And what I do imagine let that rest.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Keepers, convey him hence, and I myself
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Will see his burial better than his life.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Here dies the dusky torch of Mortimer,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Choked with ambition of the meaner sort:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: And for those wrongs, those bitter injuries,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Which Somerset hath offer'd to my house:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: I doubt not but with honour to redress;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: And therefore haste I to the parliament,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Either to be restored to my blood,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Or make my ill the advantage of my good.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Tower of London.

line_text: Comest thou with deep premeditated lines,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: With written pamphlets studiously devised,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Humphrey of Gloucester? If thou canst accuse,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or aught intend'st to lay unto my charge,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Do it without invention, suddenly;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As I with sudden and extemporal speech
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Purpose to answer what thou canst object.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Presumptuous priest! this place commands my patience,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or thou shouldst find thou hast dishonour'd me.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Think not, although in writing I preferr'd
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The manner of thy vile outrageous crimes,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That therefore I have forged, or am not able
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Verbatim to rehearse the method of my pen:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: No, prelate; such is thy audacious wickedness,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thy lewd, pestiferous and dissentious pranks,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As very infants prattle of thy pride.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thou art a most pernicious usurer,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Forward by nature, enemy to peace;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lascivious, wanton, more than well beseems
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A man of thy profession and degree;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And for thy treachery, what's more manifest?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: In that thou laid'st a trap to take my life,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As well at London bridge as at the Tower.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Beside, I fear me, if thy thoughts were sifted,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The king, thy sovereign, is not quite exempt
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: From envious malice of thy swelling heart.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Gloucester, I do defy thee. Lords, vouchsafe
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To give me hearing what I shall reply.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If I were covetous, ambitious or perverse,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As he will have me, how am I so poor?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or how haps it I seek not to advance
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or raise myself, but keep my wonted calling?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And for dissension, who preferreth peace
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: More than I do?--except I be provoked.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: No, my good lords, it is not that offends;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: It is not that that hath incensed the duke:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: It is, because no one should sway but he;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: No one but he should be about the king;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And that engenders thunder in his breast
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And makes him roar these accusations forth.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But he shall know I am as good--
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As good!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thou bastard of my grandfather!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Ay, lordly sir; for what are you, I pray,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But one imperious in another's throne?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Am I not protector, saucy priest?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And am not I a prelate of the church?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Yes, as an outlaw in a castle keeps
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And useth it to patronage his theft.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Unreverent Gloster!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thou art reverent
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Touching thy spiritual function, not thy life.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Rome shall remedy this.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Roam thither, then.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: My lord, it were your duty to forbear.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Ay, see the bishop be not overborne.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Methinks my lord should be religious
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And know the office that belongs to such.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Methinks his lordship should be humbler;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: it fitteth not a prelate so to plead.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Yes, when his holy state is touch'd so near.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: State holy or unhallow'd, what of that?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Is not his grace protector to the king?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lest it be said 'Speak, sirrah, when you should;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Must your bold verdict enter talk with lords?'
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Else would I have a fling at Winchester.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Uncles of Gloucester and of Winchester,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The special watchmen of our English weal,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I would prevail, if prayers might prevail,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To join your hearts in love and amity.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O, what a scandal is it to our crown,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That two such noble peers as ye should jar!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Believe me, lords, my tender years can tell
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Civil dissension is a viperous worm
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That gnaws the bowels of the commonwealth.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: What tumult's this?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: An uproar, I dare warrant,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Begun through malice of the bishop's men.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O, my good lords, and virtuous Henry,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Pity the city of London, pity us!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The bishop and the Duke of Gloucester's men,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Forbidden late to carry any weapon,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Have fill'd their pockets full of pebble stones
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And banding themselves in contrary parts
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Do pelt so fast at one another's pate
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That many have their giddy brains knock'd out:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Our windows are broke down in every street
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And we for fear compell'd to shut our shops.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: We charge you, on allegiance to ourself,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To hold your slaughtering hands and keep the peace.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Pray, uncle Gloucester, mitigate this strife.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Nay, if we be forbidden stones,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: We'll fall to it with our teeth.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Do what ye dare, we are as resolute.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: You of my household, leave this peevish broil
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And set this unaccustom'd fight aside.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: My lord, we know your grace to be a man
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Just and upright; and, for your royal birth,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Inferior to none but to his majesty:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And ere that we will suffer such a prince,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So kind a father of the commonweal,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To be disgraced by an inkhorn mate,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: We and our wives and children all will fight
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And have our bodies slaughtered by thy foes.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Ay, and the very parings of our nails
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Shall pitch a field when we are dead.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Stay, stay, I say!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And if you love me, as you say you do,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Let me persuade you to forbear awhile.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O, how this discord doth afflict my soul!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Can you, my Lord of Winchester, behold
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: My sighs and tears and will not once relent?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Who should be pitiful, if you be not?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or who should study to prefer a peace.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If holy churchmen take delight in broils?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Yield, my lord protector; yield, Winchester;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Except you mean with obstinate repulse
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To slay your sovereign and destroy the realm.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: You see what mischief and what murder too
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Hath been enacted through your enmity;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Then be at peace except ye thirst for blood.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: He shall submit, or I will never yield.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Compassion on the king commands me stoop;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or I would see his heart out, ere the priest
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Should ever get that privilege of me.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Behold, my Lord of Winchester, the duke
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Hath banish'd moody discontented fury,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As by his smoothed brows it doth appear:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Why look you still so stern and tragical?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Here, Winchester, I offer thee my hand.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Fie, uncle Beaufort! I have heard you preach
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That malice was a great and grievous sin;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And will not you maintain the thing you teach,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But prove a chief offender in the same?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Sweet king! the bishop hath a kindly gird.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For shame, my lord of Winchester, relent!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: What, shall a child instruct you what to do?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Well, Duke of Gloucester, I will yield to thee;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Love for thy love and hand for hand I give.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: See here, my friends and loving countrymen,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: This token serveth for a flag of truce
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Betwixt ourselves and all our followers:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So help me God, as I dissemble not!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O, loving uncle, kind Duke of Gloucester,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: How joyful am I made by this contract!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Away, my masters! trouble us no more;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But join in friendship, as your lords have done.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Content: I'll to the surgeon's.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And so will I.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And I will see what physic the tavern affords.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Accept this scroll, most gracious sovereign,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Which in the right of Richard Plantagenet
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: We do exhibit to your majesty.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Well urged, my Lord of Warwick: or sweet prince,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And if your grace mark every circumstance,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: You have great reason to do Richard right;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Especially for those occasions
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: At Eltham Place I told your majesty.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And those occasions, uncle, were of force:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Therefore, my loving lords, our pleasure is
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That Richard be restored to his blood.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Let Richard be restored to his blood;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So shall his father's wrongs be recompensed.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As will the rest, so willeth Winchester.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If Richard will be true, not that alone
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But all the whole inheritance I give
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That doth belong unto the house of York,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: From whence you spring by lineal descent.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thy humble servant vows obedience
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And humble service till the point of death.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Stoop then and set your knee against my foot;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And, in reguerdon of that duty done,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I gird thee with the valiant sword of York:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Rise Richard, like a true Plantagenet,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And rise created princely Duke of York.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And so thrive Richard as thy foes may fall!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And as my duty springs, so perish they
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That grudge one thought against your majesty!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Welcome, high prince, the mighty Duke of York!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Now will it best avail your majesty
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To cross the seas and to be crown'd in France:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The presence of a king engenders love
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Amongst his subjects and his loyal friends,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As it disanimates his enemies.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: When Gloucester says the word, King Henry goes;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For friendly counsel cuts off many foes.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Your ships already are in readiness.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Ay, we may march in England or in France,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Not seeing what is likely to ensue.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: This late dissension grown betwixt the peers
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Burns under feigned ashes of forged love
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And will at last break out into a flame:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As fester'd members rot but by degree,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Till bones and flesh and sinews fall away,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So will this base and envious discord breed.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And now I fear that fatal prophecy
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Which in the time of Henry named the Fifth
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Was in the mouth of every sucking babe;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That Henry born at Monmouth should win all
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And Henry born at Windsor lose all:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Which is so plain that Exeter doth wish
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: His days may finish ere that hapless time.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: These are the city gates, the gates of Rouen,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Through which our policy must make a breach:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Take heed, be wary how you place your words;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Talk like the vulgar sort of market men
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That come to gather money for their corn.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If we have entrance, as I hope we shall,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And that we find the slothful watch but weak,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I'll by a sign give notice to our friends,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That Charles the Dauphin may encounter them.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Our sacks shall be a mean to sack the city,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And we be lords and rulers over Rouen;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Therefore we'll knock.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Paysans, pauvres gens de France;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Poor market folks that come to sell their corn.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Enter, go in; the market bell is rung.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Now, Rouen, I'll shake thy bulwarks to the ground.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Saint Denis bless this happy stratagem!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And once again we'll sleep secure in Rouen.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Here enter'd Pucelle and her practisants;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Now she is there, how will she specify
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Where is the best and safest passage in?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: By thrusting out a torch from yonder tower;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Which, once discern'd, shows that her meaning is,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: No way to that, for weakness, which she enter'd.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Behold, this is the happy wedding torch
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That joineth Rouen unto her countrymen,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But burning fatal to the Talbotites!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: See, noble Charles, the beacon of our friend;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The burning torch in yonder turret stands.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Now shine it like a comet of revenge,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A prophet to the fall of all our foes!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Defer no time, delays have dangerous ends;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Enter, and cry 'The Dauphin!' presently,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And then do execution on the watch.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: France, thou shalt rue this treason with thy tears,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If Talbot but survive thy treachery.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Pucelle, that witch, that damned sorceress,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Hath wrought this hellish mischief unawares,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That hardly we escaped the pride of France.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Good morrow, gallants! want ye corn for bread?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I think the Duke of Burgundy will fast
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Before he'll buy again at such a rate:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: 'Twas full of darnel; do you like the taste?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Scoff on, vile fiend and shameless courtezan!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I trust ere long to choke thee with thine own
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And make thee curse the harvest of that corn.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Your grace may starve perhaps before that time.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O, let no words, but deeds, revenge this treason!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: What will you do, good grey-beard? break a lance,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And run a tilt at death within a chair?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Foul fiend of France, and hag of all despite,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Encompass'd with thy lustful paramours!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Becomes it thee to taunt his valiant age
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And twit with cowardice a man half dead?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Damsel, I'll have a bout with you again,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or else let Talbot perish with this shame.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Are ye so hot, sir? yet, Pucelle, hold thy peace;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If Talbot do but thunder, rain will follow.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: God speed the parliament! who shall be the speaker?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Dare ye come forth and meet us in the field?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Belike your lordship takes us then for fools,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To try if that our own be ours or no.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I speak not to that railing Hecate,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But unto thee, Alencon, and the rest;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Will ye, like soldiers, come and fight it out?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Signior, no.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Signior, hang! base muleters of France!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Like peasant foot-boys do they keep the walls
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And dare not take up arms like gentlemen.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Away, captains! let's get us from the walls;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For Talbot means no goodness by his looks.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: God be wi' you, my lord! we came but to tell you
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That we are here.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And there will we be too, ere it be long,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or else reproach be Talbot's greatest fame!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Vow, Burgundy, by honour of thy house,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Prick'd on by public wrongs sustain'd in France,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Either to get the town again or die:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And I, as sure as English Henry lives
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And as his father here was conqueror,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As sure as in this late-betrayed town
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Great Coeur-de-lion's heart was buried,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So sure I swear to get the town or die.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: My vows are equal partners with thy vows.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But, ere we go, regard this dying prince,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The valiant Duke of Bedford. Come, my lord,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: We will bestow you in some better place,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Fitter for sickness and for crazy age.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lord Talbot, do not so dishonour me:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Here will I sit before the walls of Rouen
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And will be partner of your weal or woe.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Courageous Bedford, let us now persuade you.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Not to be gone from hence; for once I read
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That stout Pendragon in his litter sick
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Came to the field and vanquished his foes:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Methinks I should revive the soldiers' hearts,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Because I ever found them as myself.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Undaunted spirit in a dying breast!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Then be it so: heavens keep old Bedford safe!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And now no more ado, brave Burgundy,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But gather we our forces out of hand
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And set upon our boasting enemy.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Whither away, Sir John Fastolfe, in such haste?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Whither away! to save myself by flight:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: We are like to have the overthrow again.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: What! will you fly, and leave Lord Talbot?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Ay,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: All the Talbots in the world, to save my life!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Cowardly knight! ill fortune follow thee!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Now, quiet soul, depart when heaven please,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For I have seen our enemies' overthrow.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: What is the trust or strength of foolish man?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: They that of late were daring with their scoffs
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Are glad and fain by flight to save themselves.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lost, and recover'd in a day again!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: This is a double honour, Burgundy:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Yet heavens have glory for this victory!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Warlike and martial Talbot, Burgundy
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Enshrines thee in his heart and there erects
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thy noble deeds as valour's monuments.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thanks, gentle duke. But where is Pucelle now?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I think her old familiar is asleep:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Now where's the Bastard's braves, and Charles his gleeks?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: What, all amort? Rouen hangs her head for grief
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That such a valiant company are fled.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Now will we take some order in the town,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Placing therein some expert officers,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And then depart to Paris to the king,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For there young Henry with his nobles lie.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: What wills Lord Talbot pleaseth Burgundy.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But yet, before we go, let's not forget
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The noble Duke of Bedford late deceased,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But see his exequies fulfill'd in Rouen:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A braver soldier never couched lance,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A gentler heart did never sway in court;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But kings and mightiest potentates must die,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For that's the end of human misery.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Dismay not, princes, at this accident,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Nor grieve that Rouen is so recovered:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Care is no cure, but rather corrosive,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: For things that are not to be remedied.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Let frantic Talbot triumph for a while
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And like a peacock sweep along his tail;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: We'll pull his plumes and take away his train,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: If Dauphin and the rest will be but ruled.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: We have been guided by thee hitherto,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And of thy cunning had no diffidence:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: One sudden foil shall never breed distrust.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Search out thy wit for secret policies,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And we will make thee famous through the world.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: We'll set thy statue in some holy place,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And have thee reverenced like a blessed saint:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Employ thee then, sweet virgin, for our good.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Then thus it must be; this doth Joan devise:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: By fair persuasions mix'd with sugar'd words
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: We will entice the Duke of Burgundy
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: To leave the Talbot and to follow us.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Ay, marry, sweeting, if we could do that,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: France were no place for Henry's warriors;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Nor should that nation boast it so with us,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: But be extirped from our provinces.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: For ever should they be expulsed from France
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And not have title of an earldom here.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Your honours shall perceive how I will work
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: To bring this matter to the wished end.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Hark! by the sound of drum you may perceive
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Their powers are marching unto Paris-ward.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: There goes the Talbot, with his colours spread,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And all the troops of English after him.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Now in the rearward comes the duke and his:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Fortune in favour makes him lag behind.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Summon a parley; we will talk with him.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: A parley with the Duke of Burgundy!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Who craves a parley with the Burgundy?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: The princely Charles of France, thy countryman.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: What say'st thou, Charles? for I am marching hence.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Speak, Pucelle, and enchant him with thy words.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Brave Burgundy, undoubted hope of France!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Stay, let thy humble handmaid speak to thee.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Speak on; but be not over-tedious.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Look on thy country, look on fertile France,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And see the cities and the towns defaced
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: By wasting ruin of the cruel foe.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: As looks the mother on her lowly babe
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: When death doth close his tender dying eyes,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: See, see the pining malady of France;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Behold the wounds, the most unnatural wounds,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Which thou thyself hast given her woful breast.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: O, turn thy edged sword another way;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Strike those that hurt, and hurt not those that help.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: One drop of blood drawn from thy country's bosom
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Should grieve thee more than streams of foreign gore:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Return thee therefore with a flood of tears,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And wash away thy country's stained spots.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Either she hath bewitch'd me with her words,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Or nature makes me suddenly relent.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.
