line_text: Besides, all French and France exclaims on thee,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Doubting thy birth and lawful progeny.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Who joint'st thou with but with a lordly nation
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: That will not trust thee but for profit's sake?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: When Talbot hath set footing once in France
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And fashion'd thee that instrument of ill,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Who then but English Henry will be lord
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And thou be thrust out like a fugitive?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Call we to mind, and mark but this for proof,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Was not the Duke of Orleans thy foe?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And was he not in England prisoner?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: But when they heard he was thine enemy,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: They set him free without his ransom paid,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: In spite of Burgundy and all his friends.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: See, then, thou fight'st against thy countrymen
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And joint'st with them will be thy slaughtermen.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Come, come, return; return, thou wandering lord:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Charles and the rest will take thee in their arms.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: I am vanquished; these haughty words of hers
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Have batter'd me like roaring cannon-shot,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And made me almost yield upon my knees.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Forgive me, country, and sweet countrymen,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And, lords, accept this hearty kind embrace:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: My forces and my power of men are yours:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: So farewell, Talbot; I'll no longer trust thee.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Welcome, brave duke! thy friendship makes us fresh.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And doth beget new courage in our breasts.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Pucelle hath bravely play'd her part in this,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And doth deserve a coronet of gold.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: Now let us on, my lords, and join our powers,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: And seek how we may prejudice the foe.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  The plains near Rouen.

line_text: My gracious prince, and honourable peers,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Hearing of your arrival in this realm,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I have awhile given truce unto my wars,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To do my duty to my sovereign:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: In sign, whereof, this arm, that hath reclaim'd
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To your obedience fifty fortresses,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Twelve cities and seven walled towns of strength,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Beside five hundred prisoners of esteem,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lets fall his sword before your highness' feet,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And with submissive loyalty of heart
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Ascribes the glory of his conquest got
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: First to my God and next unto your grace.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Is this the Lord Talbot, uncle Gloucester,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That hath so long been resident in France?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Yes, if it please your majesty, my liege.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Welcome, brave captain and victorious lord!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: When I was young, as yet I am not old,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I do remember how my father said
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A stouter champion never handled sword.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Long since we were resolved of your truth,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Your faithful service and your toil in war;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Yet never have you tasted our reward,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or been reguerdon'd with so much as thanks,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Because till now we never saw your face:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Therefore, stand up; and, for these good deserts,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: We here create you Earl of Shrewsbury;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And in our coronation take your place.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Now, sir, to you, that were so hot at sea,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Disgracing of these colours that I wear
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: In honour of my noble Lord of York:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Darest thou maintain the former words thou spakest?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Yes, sir; as well as you dare patronage
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The envious barking of your saucy tongue
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Against my lord the Duke of Somerset.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Sirrah, thy lord I honour as he is.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Why, what is he? as good a man as York.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Hark ye; not so: in witness, take ye that.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Villain, thou know'st the law of arms is such
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That whoso draws a sword, 'tis present death,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or else this blow should broach thy dearest blood.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But I'll unto his majesty, and crave
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I may have liberty to venge this wrong;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: When thou shalt see I'll meet thee to thy cost.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Well, miscreant, I'll be there as soon as you;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And, after, meet you sooner than you would.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lord bishop, set the crown upon his head.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: God save King Henry, of that name the sixth!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Now, governor of Paris, take your oath,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: That you elect no other king but him;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Esteem none friends but such as are his friends,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And none your foes but such as shall pretend
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Malicious practises against his state:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: This shall ye do, so help you righteous God!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: My gracious sovereign, as I rode from Calais,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: To haste unto your coronation,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: A letter was deliver'd to my hands,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Writ to your grace from the Duke of Burgundy.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Shame to the Duke of Burgundy and thee!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: I vow'd, base knight, when I did meet thee next,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: To tear the garter from thy craven's leg,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Which I have done, because unworthily
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Thou wast installed in that high degree.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Pardon me, princely Henry, and the rest
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: This dastard, at the battle of Patay,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: When but in all I was six thousand strong
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And that the French were almost ten to one,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Before we met or that a stroke was given,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Like to a trusty squire did run away:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: In which assault we lost twelve hundred men;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Myself and divers gentlemen beside
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Were there surprised and taken prisoners.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Then judge, great lords, if I have done amiss;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Or whether that such cowards ought to wear
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: This ornament of knighthood, yea or no.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: To say the truth, this fact was infamous
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And ill beseeming any common man,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Much more a knight, a captain and a leader.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: When first this order was ordain'd, my lords,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Knights of the garter were of noble birth,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Valiant and virtuous, full of haughty courage,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Such as were grown to credit by the wars;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Not fearing death, nor shrinking for distress,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: But always resolute in most extremes.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: He then that is not furnish'd in this sort
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Doth but usurp the sacred name of knight,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Profaning this most honourable order,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And should, if I were worthy to be judge,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Be quite degraded, like a hedge-born swain
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: That doth presume to boast of gentle blood.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Stain to thy countrymen, thou hear'st thy doom!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Be packing, therefore, thou that wast a knight:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Henceforth we banish thee, on pain of death.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And now, my lord protector, view the letter
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Sent from our uncle Duke of Burgundy.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: What means his grace, that he hath changed his style?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: No more but, plain and bluntly, 'To the king!'
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Hath he forgot he is his sovereign?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Or doth this churlish superscription
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Pretend some alteration in good will?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: What's here?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: 'I have, upon especial cause,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Moved with compassion of my country's wreck,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Together with the pitiful complaints
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Of such as your oppression feeds upon,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Forsaken your pernicious faction
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And join'd with Charles, the rightful King of France.'
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: O monstrous treachery! can this be so,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: That in alliance, amity and oaths,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: There should be found such false dissembling guile?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: What! doth my uncle Burgundy revolt?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: He doth, my lord, and is become your foe.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Is that the worst this letter doth contain?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: It is the worst, and all, my lord, he writes.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Why, then, Lord Talbot there shall talk with him
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And give him chastisement for this abuse.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: How say you, my lord? are you not content?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Content, my liege! yes, but that I am prevented,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: I should have begg'd I might have been employ'd.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Then gather strength and march unto him straight:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Let him perceive how ill we brook his treason
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And what offence it is to flout his friends.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: I go, my lord, in heart desiring still
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: You may behold confusion of your foes.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Grant me the combat, gracious sovereign.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And me, my lord, grant me the combat too.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: This is my servant: hear him, noble prince.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And this is mine: sweet Henry, favour him.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Be patient, lords; and give them leave to speak.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Say, gentlemen, what makes you thus exclaim?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And wherefore crave you combat? or with whom?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: With him, my lord; for he hath done me wrong.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And I with him; for he hath done me wrong.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: What is that wrong whereof you both complain?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: First let me know, and then I'll answer you.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Crossing the sea from England into France,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: This fellow here, with envious carping tongue,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Upbraided me about the rose I wear;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Saying, the sanguine colour of the leaves
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Did represent my master's blushing cheeks,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: When stubbornly he did repugn the truth
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: About a certain question in the law
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Argued betwixt the Duke of York and him;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: With other vile and ignominious terms:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: In confutation of which rude reproach
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And in defence of my lord's worthiness,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: I crave the benefit of law of arms.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And that is my petition, noble lord:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: For though he seem with forged quaint conceit
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: To set a gloss upon his bold intent,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Yet know, my lord, I was provoked by him;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And he first took exceptions at this badge,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Pronouncing that the paleness of this flower
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Bewray'd the faintness of my master's heart.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Will not this malice, Somerset, be left?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Your private grudge, my Lord of York, will out,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Though ne'er so cunningly you smother it.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Good Lord, what madness rules in brainsick men,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: When for so slight and frivolous a cause
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Such factious emulations shall arise!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Good cousins both, of York and Somerset,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Quiet yourselves, I pray, and be at peace.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Let this dissension first be tried by fight,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And then your highness shall command a peace.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: The quarrel toucheth none but us alone;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Betwixt ourselves let us decide it then.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: There is my pledge; accept it, Somerset.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Nay, let it rest where it began at first.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Confirm it so, mine honourable lord.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Confirm it so! Confounded be your strife!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And perish ye, with your audacious prate!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Presumptuous vassals, are you not ashamed
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: With this immodest clamorous outrage
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: To trouble and disturb the king and us?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And you, my lords, methinks you do not well
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: To bear with their perverse objections;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Much less to take occasion from their mouths
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: To raise a mutiny betwixt yourselves:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Let me persuade you take a better course.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: It grieves his highness: good my lords, be friends.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Come hither, you that would be combatants:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Henceforth I charge you, as you love our favour,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Quite to forget this quarrel and the cause.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And you, my lords, remember where we are,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: In France, amongst a fickle wavering nation:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: If they perceive dissension in our looks
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And that within ourselves we disagree,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: How will their grudging stomachs be provoked
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: To wilful disobedience, and rebel!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Beside, what infamy will there arise,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: When foreign princes shall be certified
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: That for a toy, a thing of no regard,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: King Henry's peers and chief nobility
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Destroy'd themselves, and lost the realm of France!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: O, think upon the conquest of my father,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: My tender years, and let us not forego
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: That for a trifle that was bought with blood
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Let me be umpire in this doubtful strife.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: I see no reason, if I wear this rose,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: That any one should therefore be suspicious
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: I more incline to Somerset than York:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Both are my kinsmen, and I love them both:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: As well they may upbraid me with my crown,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Because, forsooth, the king of Scots is crown'd.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: But your discretions better can persuade
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Than I am able to instruct or teach:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And therefore, as we hither came in peace,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: So let us still continue peace and love.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Cousin of York, we institute your grace
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: To be our regent in these parts of France:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And, good my Lord of Somerset, unite
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Your troops of horsemen with his bands of foot;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And, like true subjects, sons of your progenitors,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Go cheerfully together and digest.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Your angry choler on your enemies.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Ourself, my lord protector and the rest
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: After some respite will return to Calais;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: From thence to England; where I hope ere long
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: To be presented, by your victories,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: With Charles, Alencon and that traitorous rout.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: My Lord of York, I promise you, the king
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Prettily, methought, did play the orator.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: And so he did; but yet I like it not,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: In that he wears the badge of Somerset.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Tush, that was but his fancy, blame him not;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: I dare presume, sweet prince, he thought no harm.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: An if I wist he did,--but let it rest;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Other affairs must now be managed.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Well didst thou, Richard, to suppress thy voice;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: For, had the passions of thy heart burst out,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: I fear we should have seen decipher'd there
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: More rancorous spite, more furious raging broils,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Than yet can be imagined or supposed.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: But howsoe'er, no simple man that sees
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: This jarring discord of nobility,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: This shouldering of each other in the court,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: This factious bandying of their favourites,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: But that it doth presage some ill event.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: 'Tis much when sceptres are in children's hands;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: But more when envy breeds unkind division;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: There comes the rain, there begins confusion.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  Paris. A hall of state.

line_text: Go to the gates of Bourdeaux, trumpeter:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Summon their general unto the wall.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: English John Talbot, captains, calls you forth,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Servant in arms to Harry King of England;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And thus he would: Open your city gates;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Be humble to us; call my sovereign yours,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And do him homage as obedient subjects;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And I'll withdraw me and my bloody power:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But, if you frown upon this proffer'd peace,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: You tempt the fury of my three attendants,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lean famine, quartering steel, and climbing fire;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Who in a moment even with the earth
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Shall lay your stately and air-braving towers,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If you forsake the offer of their love.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thou ominous and fearful owl of death,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Our nation's terror and their bloody scourge!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The period of thy tyranny approacheth.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: On us thou canst not enter but by death;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For, I protest, we are well fortified
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And strong enough to issue out and fight:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If thou retire, the Dauphin, well appointed,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Stands with the snares of war to tangle thee:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: On either hand thee there are squadrons pitch'd,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To wall thee from the liberty of flight;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And no way canst thou turn thee for redress,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But death doth front thee with apparent spoil
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And pale destruction meets thee in the face.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Ten thousand French have ta'en the sacrament
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To rive their dangerous artillery
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Upon no Christian soul but English Talbot.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lo, there thou stand'st, a breathing valiant man,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Of an invincible unconquer'd spirit!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: This is the latest glory of thy praise
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That I, thy enemy, due thee withal;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For ere the glass, that now begins to run,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Finish the process of his sandy hour,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: These eyes, that see thee now well coloured,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Shall see thee wither'd, bloody, pale and dead.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Hark! hark! the Dauphin's drum, a warning bell,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Sings heavy music to thy timorous soul;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And mine shall ring thy dire departure out.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: He fables not; I hear the enemy:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Out, some light horsemen, and peruse their wings.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O, negligent and heedless discipline!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: How are we park'd and bounded in a pale,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A little herd of England's timorous deer,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Mazed with a yelping kennel of French curs!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If we be English deer, be then in blood;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Not rascal-like, to fall down with a pinch,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But rather, moody-mad and desperate stags,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Turn on the bloody hounds with heads of steel
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And make the cowards stand aloof at bay:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Sell every man his life as dear as mine,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And they shall find dear deer of us, my friends.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: God and Saint George, Talbot and England's right,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Prosper our colours in this dangerous fight!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Are not the speedy scouts return'd again,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That dogg'd the mighty army of the Dauphin?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: They are return'd, my lord, and give it out
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That he is march'd to Bourdeaux with his power,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To fight with Talbot: as he march'd along,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: By your espials were discovered
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Two mightier troops than that the Dauphin led,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Which join'd with him and made their march for Bourdeaux.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A plague upon that villain Somerset,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That thus delays my promised supply
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Of horsemen, that were levied for this siege!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Renowned Talbot doth expect my aid,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And I am lowted by a traitor villain
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And cannot help the noble chevalier:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: God comfort him in this necessity!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If he miscarry, farewell wars in France.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thou princely leader of our English strength,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Never so needful on the earth of France,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Spur to the rescue of the noble Talbot,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Who now is girdled with a waist of iron
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And hemm'd about with grim destruction:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To Bourdeaux, warlike duke! to Bourdeaux, York!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Else, farewell Talbot, France, and England's honour.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O God, that Somerset, who in proud heart
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Doth stop my cornets, were in Talbot's place!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So should we save a valiant gentleman
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: By forfeiting a traitor and a coward.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Mad ire and wrathful fury makes me weep,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That thus we die, while remiss traitors sleep.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O, send some succor to the distress'd lord!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: He dies, we lose; I break my warlike word;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: We mourn, France smiles; we lose, they daily get;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: All 'long of this vile traitor Somerset.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Then God take mercy on brave Talbot's soul;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And on his son young John, who two hours since
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I met in travel toward his warlike father!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: This seven years did not Talbot see his son;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And now they meet where both their lives are done.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Alas, what joy shall noble Talbot have
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To bid his young son welcome to his grave?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Away! vexation almost stops my breath,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That sunder'd friends greet in the hour of death.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lucy, farewell; no more my fortune can,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But curse the cause I cannot aid the man.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Maine, Blois, Poictiers, and Tours, are won away,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: 'Long all of Somerset and his delay.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thus, while the vulture of sedition
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Feeds in the bosom of such great commanders,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Sleeping neglection doth betray to loss
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The conquest of our scarce cold conqueror,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That ever living man of memory,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Henry the Fifth: whiles they each other cross,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lives, honours, lands and all hurry to loss.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: It is too late; I cannot send them now:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: This expedition was by York and Talbot
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Too rashly plotted: all our general force
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Might with a sally of the very town
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Be buckled with: the over-daring Talbot
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Hath sullied all his gloss of former honour
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: By this unheedful, desperate, wild adventure:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: York set him on to fight and die in shame,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: That, Talbot dead, great York might bear the name.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Here is Sir William Lucy, who with me
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Set from our o'ermatch'd forces forth for aid.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: How now, Sir William! whither were you sent?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Whither, my lord? from bought and sold Lord Talbot;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Who, ring'd about with bold adversity,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Cries out for noble York and Somerset,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: To beat assailing death from his weak legions:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: And whiles the honourable captain there
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Drops bloody sweat from his war-wearied limbs,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: And, in advantage lingering, looks for rescue,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: You, his false hopes, the trust of England's honour,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Keep off aloof with worthless emulation.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Let not your private discord keep away
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: The levied succors that should lend him aid,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: While he, renowned noble gentleman,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Yields up his life unto a world of odds:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Orleans the Bastard, Charles, Burgundy,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Alencon, Reignier, compass him about,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: And Talbot perisheth by your default.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: York set him on; York should have sent him aid.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: And York as fast upon your grace exclaims;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Swearing that you withhold his levied host,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Collected for this expedition.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: York lies; he might have sent and had the horse;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: I owe him little duty, and less love;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: And take foul scorn to fawn on him by sending.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: The fraud of England, not the force of France,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Hath now entrapp'd the noble-minded Talbot:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Never to England shall he bear his life;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: But dies, betray'd to fortune by your strife.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Come, go; I will dispatch the horsemen straight:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Within six hours they will be at his aid.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: Too late comes rescue: he is ta'en or slain;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: For fly he could not, if he would have fled;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: And fly would Talbot never, though he might.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: If he be dead, brave Talbot, then adieu!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: His fame lives in the world, his shame in you.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Other plains in Gascony.

line_text: O young John Talbot! I did send for thee
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: To tutor thee in stratagems of war,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: That Talbot's name might be in thee revived
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: When sapless age and weak unable limbs
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Should bring thy father to his drooping chair.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: But, O malignant and ill-boding stars!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Now thou art come unto a feast of death,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: A terrible and unavoided danger:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Therefore, dear boy, mount on my swiftest horse;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: And I'll direct thee how thou shalt escape
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: By sudden flight: come, dally not, be gone.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Is my name Talbot? and am I your son?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: And shall I fly? O if you love my mother,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Dishonour not her honourable name,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: To make a bastard and a slave of me!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: The world will say, he is not Talbot's blood,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: That basely fled when noble Talbot stood.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Fly, to revenge my death, if I be slain.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: He that flies so will ne'er return again.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: If we both stay, we both are sure to die.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Then let me stay; and, father, do you fly:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Your loss is great, so your regard should be;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: My worth unknown, no loss is known in me.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Upon my death the French can little boast;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: In yours they will, in you all hopes are lost.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Flight cannot stain the honour you have won;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: But mine it will, that no exploit have done:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: You fled for vantage, everyone will swear;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: But, if I bow, they'll say it was for fear.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: There is no hope that ever I will stay,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: If the first hour I shrink and run away.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Here on my knee I beg mortality,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Rather than life preserved with infamy.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Shall all thy mother's hopes lie in one tomb?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Ay, rather than I'll shame my mother's womb.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Upon my blessing, I command thee go.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: To fight I will, but not to fly the foe.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Part of thy father may be saved in thee.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: No part of him but will be shame in me.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Thou never hadst renown, nor canst not lose it.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Yes, your renowned name: shall flight abuse it?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Thy father's charge shall clear thee from that stain.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: You cannot witness for me, being slain.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: If death be so apparent, then both fly.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: And leave my followers here to fight and die?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: My age was never tainted with such shame.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: And shall my youth be guilty of such blame?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: No more can I be sever'd from your side,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Than can yourself yourself in twain divide:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Stay, go, do what you will, the like do I;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: For live I will not, if my father die.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Then here I take my leave of thee, fair son,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Born to eclipse thy life this afternoon.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Come, side by side together live and die.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: And soul with soul from France to heaven fly.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  The English camp near Bourdeaux.

line_text: Saint George and victory! fight, soldiers, fight.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: The regent hath with Talbot broke his word
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: And left us to the rage of France his sword.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Where is John Talbot? Pause, and take thy breath;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: I gave thee life and rescued thee from death.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: O, twice my father, twice am I thy son!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: The life thou gavest me first was lost and done,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Till with thy warlike sword, despite of late,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: To my determined time thou gavest new date.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: When from the Dauphin's crest thy sword struck fire,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: It warm'd thy father's heart with proud desire
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Of bold-faced victory. Then leaden age,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Quicken'd with youthful spleen and warlike rage,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Beat down Alencon, Orleans, Burgundy,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: And from the pride of Gallia rescued thee.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: The ireful bastard Orleans, that drew blood
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: From thee, my boy, and had the maidenhood
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Of thy first fight, I soon encountered,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: And interchanging blows I quickly shed
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Some of his bastard blood; and in disgrace
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Bespoke him thus; 'Contaminated, base
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: And misbegotten blood I spill of thine,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Mean and right poor, for that pure blood of mine
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Which thou didst force from Talbot, my brave boy:'
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Here, purposing the Bastard to destroy,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Came in strong rescue. Speak, thy father's care,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Art thou not weary, John? how dost thou fare?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Wilt thou yet leave the battle, boy, and fly,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Now thou art seal'd the son of chivalry?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Fly, to revenge my death when I am dead:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: The help of one stands me in little stead.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: O, too much folly is it, well I wot,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: To hazard all our lives in one small boat!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: If I to-day die not with Frenchmen's rage,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: To-morrow I shall die with mickle age:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: By me they nothing gain an if I stay;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: 'Tis but the shortening of my life one day:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: In thee thy mother dies, our household's name,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: My death's revenge, thy youth, and England's fame:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: All these and more we hazard by thy stay;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: All these are saved if thou wilt fly away.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: The sword of Orleans hath not made me smart;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: These words of yours draw life-blood from my heart:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: On that advantage, bought with such a shame,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: To save a paltry life and slay bright fame,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Before young Talbot from old Talbot fly,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: The coward horse that bears me fail and die!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: And like me to the peasant boys of France,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: To be shame's scorn and subject of mischance!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Surely, by all the glory you have won,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: An if I fly, I am not Talbot's son:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Then talk no more of flight, it is no boot;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: If son to Talbot, die at Talbot's foot.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Then follow thou thy desperate sire of Crete,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Thou Icarus; thy life to me is sweet:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: If thou wilt fight, fight by thy father's side;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: And, commendable proved, let's die in pride.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  A field of battle.

line_text: Where is my other life? mine own is gone;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: O, where's young Talbot? where is valiant John?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Triumphant death, smear'd with captivity,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Young Talbot's valour makes me smile at thee:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: When he perceived me shrink and on my knee,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: His bloody sword he brandish'd over me,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And, like a hungry lion, did commence
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Rough deeds of rage and stern impatience;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: But when my angry guardant stood alone,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Tendering my ruin and assail'd of none,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Dizzy-eyed fury and great rage of heart
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Suddenly made him from my side to start
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Into the clustering battle of the French;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And in that sea of blood my boy did drench
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: His over-mounting spirit, and there died,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: My Icarus, my blossom, in his pride.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: O, my dear lord, lo, where your son is borne!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Thou antic death, which laugh'st us here to scorn,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Anon, from thy insulting tyranny,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Coupled in bonds of perpetuity,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Two Talbots, winged through the lither sky,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: In thy despite shall 'scape mortality.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: O, thou, whose wounds become hard-favour'd death,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Speak to thy father ere thou yield thy breath!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Brave death by speaking, whether he will or no;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Imagine him a Frenchman and thy foe.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Poor boy! he smiles, methinks, as who should say,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Had death been French, then death had died to-day.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Come, come and lay him in his father's arms:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: My spirit can no longer bear these harms.
