play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Soldiers, adieu! I have what I would have,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Now my old arms are young John Talbot's grave.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Had York and Somerset brought rescue in,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: We should have found a bloody day of this.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: How the young whelp of Talbot's, raging-wood,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Did flesh his puny sword in Frenchmen's blood!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Once I encounter'd him, and thus I said:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: 'Thou maiden youth, be vanquish'd by a maid:'
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: But, with a proud majestical high scorn,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: He answer'd thus: 'Young Talbot was not born
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: To be the pillage of a giglot wench:'
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: So, rushing in the bowels of the French,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: He left me proudly, as unworthy fight.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Doubtless he would have made a noble knight;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: See, where he lies inhearsed in the arms
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Of the most bloody nurser of his harms!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Hew them to pieces, hack their bones asunder
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Whose life was England's glory, Gallia's wonder.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: O, no, forbear! for that which we have fled
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: During the life, let us not wrong it dead.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Herald, conduct me to the Dauphin's tent,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: To know who hath obtained the glory of the day.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: On what submissive message art thou sent?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Submission, Dauphin! 'tis a mere French word;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: We English warriors wot not what it means.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: I come to know what prisoners thou hast ta'en
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And to survey the bodies of the dead.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: For prisoners ask'st thou? hell our prison is.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: But tell me whom thou seek'st.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: But where's the great Alcides of the field,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Valiant Lord Talbot, Earl of Shrewsbury,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Created, for his rare success in arms,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Great Earl of Washford, Waterford and Valence;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Lord Talbot of Goodrig and Urchinfield,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Lord Strange of Blackmere, Lord Verdun of Alton,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Lord Cromwell of Wingfield, Lord Furnival of Sheffield,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: The thrice-victorious Lord of Falconbridge;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Knight of the noble order of Saint George,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Worthy Saint Michael and the Golden Fleece;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Great marshal to Henry the Sixth
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Of all his wars within the realm of France?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Here is a silly stately style indeed!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: The Turk, that two and fifty kingdoms hath,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Writes not so tedious a style as this.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Him that thou magnifiest with all these titles
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Stinking and fly-blown lies here at our feet.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Is Talbot slain, the Frenchmen's only scourge,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Your kingdom's terror and black Nemesis?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: O, were mine eyeballs into bullets turn'd,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: That I in rage might shoot them at your faces!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: O, that I could but call these dead to life!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: It were enough to fright the realm of France:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Were but his picture left amongst you here,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: It would amaze the proudest of you all.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Give me their bodies, that I may bear them hence
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And give them burial as beseems their worth.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: I think this upstart is old Talbot's ghost,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: He speaks with such a proud commanding spirit.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: For God's sake let him have 'em; to keep them here,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: They would but stink, and putrefy the air.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Go, take their bodies hence.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: I'll bear them hence; but from their ashes shall be rear'd
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: A phoenix that shall make all France afeard.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: So we be rid of them, do with 'em what thou wilt.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And now to Paris, in this conquering vein:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: All will be ours, now bloody Talbot's slain.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Have you perused the letters from the pope,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The emperor and the Earl of Armagnac?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I have, my lord: and their intent is this:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: They humbly sue unto your excellence
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To have a godly peace concluded of
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Between the realms of England and of France.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: How doth your grace affect their motion?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Well, my good lord; and as the only means
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To stop effusion of our Christian blood
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And 'stablish quietness on every side.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Ay, marry, uncle; for I always thought
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: It was both impious and unnatural
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That such immanity and bloody strife
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Should reign among professors of one faith.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Beside, my lord, the sooner to effect
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And surer bind this knot of amity,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The Earl of Armagnac, near knit to Charles,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A man of great authority in France,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Proffers his only daughter to your grace
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: In marriage, with a large and sumptuous dowry.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Marriage, uncle! alas, my years are young!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And fitter is my study and my books
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Than wanton dalliance with a paramour.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Yet call the ambassador; and, as you please,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So let them have their answers every one:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I shall be well content with any choice
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Tends to God's glory and my country's weal.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: What! is my Lord of Winchester install'd,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And call'd unto a cardinal's degree?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Then I perceive that will be verified
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Henry the Fifth did sometime prophesy,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: 'If once he come to be a cardinal,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: He'll make his cap co-equal with the crown.'
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: My lords ambassadors, your several suits
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Have been consider'd and debated on.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And therefore are we certainly resolved
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To draw conditions of a friendly peace;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Which by my Lord of Winchester we mean
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Shall be transported presently to France.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And for the proffer of my lord your master,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I have inform'd his highness so at large
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As liking of the lady's virtuous gifts,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Her beauty and the value of her dower,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: He doth intend she shall be England's queen.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: In argument and proof of which contract,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Bear her this jewel, pledge of my affection.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And so, my lord protector, see them guarded
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And safely brought to Dover; where inshipp'd
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Commit them to the fortune of the sea.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Stay, my lord legate: you shall first receive
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The sum of money which I promised
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Should be deliver'd to his holiness
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For clothing me in these grave ornaments.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I will attend upon your lordship's leisure.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or be inferior to the proudest peer.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Humphrey of Gloucester, thou shalt well perceive
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That, neither in birth or for authority,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The bishop will be overborne by thee:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I'll either make thee stoop and bend thy knee,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or sack this country with a mutiny.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: These news, my lord, may cheer our drooping spirits:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: 'Tis said the stout Parisians do revolt
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: And turn again unto the warlike French.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: Then march to Paris, royal Charles of France,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: And keep not back your powers in dalliance.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: Peace be amongst them, if they turn to us;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: Else, ruin combat with their palaces!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: Success unto our valiant general,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: And happiness to his accomplices!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: What tidings send our scouts? I prithee, speak.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: The English army, that divided was
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: Into two parties, is now conjoined in one,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: And means to give you battle presently.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: Somewhat too sudden, sirs, the warning is;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: But we will presently provide for them.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: I trust the ghost of Talbot is not there:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: Now he is gone, my lord, you need not fear.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: Of all base passions, fear is most accursed.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: Command the conquest, Charles, it shall be thine,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: Let Henry fret and all the world repine.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: Then on, my lords; and France be fortunate!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  France. Plains in Anjou.

line_text: The regent conquers, and the Frenchmen fly.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Now help, ye charming spells and periapts;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And ye choice spirits that admonish me
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And give me signs of future accidents.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: You speedy helpers, that are substitutes
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Under the lordly monarch of the north,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Appear and aid me in this enterprise.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: This speedy and quick appearance argues proof
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Of your accustom'd diligence to me.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Now, ye familiar spirits, that are cull'd
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Out of the powerful regions under earth,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Help me this once, that France may get the field.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O, hold me not with silence over-long!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Where I was wont to feed you with my blood,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I'll lop a member off and give it you
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: In earnest of further benefit,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So you do condescend to help me now.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: No hope to have redress? My body shall
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Pay recompense, if you will grant my suit.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Cannot my body nor blood-sacrifice
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Entreat you to your wonted furtherance?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Then take my soul, my body, soul and all,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Before that England give the French the foil.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: See, they forsake me! Now the time is come
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That France must vail her lofty-plumed crest
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And let her head fall into England's lap.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: My ancient incantations are too weak,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And hell too strong for me to buckle with:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Now, France, thy glory droopeth to the dust.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Damsel of France, I think I have you fast:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Unchain your spirits now with spelling charms
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And try if they can gain your liberty.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A goodly prize, fit for the devil's grace!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: See, how the ugly wench doth bend her brows,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As if with Circe she would change my shape!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Changed to a worser shape thou canst not be.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O, Charles the Dauphin is a proper man;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: No shape but his can please your dainty eye.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A plaguing mischief light on Charles and thee!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And may ye both be suddenly surprised
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: By bloody hands, in sleeping on your beds!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Fell banning hag, enchantress, hold thy tongue!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I prithee, give me leave to curse awhile.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Curse, miscreant, when thou comest to the stake.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Be what thou wilt, thou art my prisoner.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O fairest beauty, do not fear nor fly!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For I will touch thee but with reverent hands;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I kiss these fingers for eternal peace,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And lay them gently on thy tender side.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Who art thou? say, that I may honour thee.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Margaret my name, and daughter to a king,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The King of Naples, whosoe'er thou art.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: An earl I am, and Suffolk am I call'd.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Be not offended, nature's miracle,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thou art allotted to be ta'en by me:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So doth the swan her downy cygnets save,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Keeping them prisoner underneath her wings.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Yet, if this servile usage once offend.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Go, and be free again, as Suffolk's friend.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O, stay! I have no power to let her pass;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: My hand would free her, but my heart says no
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As plays the sun upon the glassy streams,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Twinkling another counterfeited beam,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So seems this gorgeous beauty to mine eyes.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Fain would I woo her, yet I dare not speak:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I'll call for pen and ink, and write my mind.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Fie, de la Pole! disable not thyself;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Hast not a tongue? is she not here?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Wilt thou be daunted at a woman's sight?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Ay, beauty's princely majesty is such,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Confounds the tongue and makes the senses rough.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Say, Earl of Suffolk--if thy name be so--
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: What ransom must I pay before I pass?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For I perceive I am thy prisoner.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: How canst thou tell she will deny thy suit,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Before thou make a trial of her love?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Why speak'st thou not? what ransom must I pay?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: She's beautiful, and therefore to be woo'd;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: She is a woman, therefore to be won.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Wilt thou accept of ransom? yea, or no.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Fond man, remember that thou hast a wife;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Then how can Margaret be thy paramour?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I were best to leave him, for he will not hear.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: There all is marr'd; there lies a cooling card.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: He talks at random; sure, the man is mad.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And yet a dispensation may be had.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And yet I would that you would answer me.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I'll win this Lady Margaret. For whom?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Why, for my king: tush, that's a wooden thing!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: He talks of wood: it is some carpenter.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Yet so my fancy may be satisfied,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And peace established between these realms
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But there remains a scruple in that too;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For though her father be the King of Naples,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Duke of Anjou and Maine, yet is he poor,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And our nobility will scorn the match.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Hear ye, captain, are you not at leisure?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: It shall be so, disdain they ne'er so much.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Henry is youthful and will quickly yield.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Madam, I have a secret to reveal.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: What though I be enthrall'd? he seems a knight,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And will not any way dishonour me.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lady, vouchsafe to listen what I say.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Perhaps I shall be rescued by the French;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And then I need not crave his courtesy.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Sweet madam, give me a hearing in a cause--
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Tush, women have been captivate ere now.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lady, wherefore talk you so?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I cry you mercy, 'tis but Quid for Quo.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Say, gentle princess, would you not suppose
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Your bondage happy, to be made a queen?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To be a queen in bondage is more vile
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Than is a slave in base servility;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For princes should be free.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And so shall you,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If happy England's royal king be free.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Why, what concerns his freedom unto me?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I'll undertake to make thee Henry's queen,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To put a golden sceptre in thy hand
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And set a precious crown upon thy head,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If thou wilt condescend to be my--
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: What?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: His love.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I am unworthy to be Henry's wife.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: No, gentle madam; I unworthy am
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To woo so fair a dame to be his wife,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And have no portion in the choice myself.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: How say you, madam, are ye so content?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: An if my father please, I am content.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Then call our captains and our colours forth.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And, madam, at your father's castle walls
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: We'll crave a parley, to confer with him.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: See, Reignier, see, thy daughter prisoner!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To whom?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To me.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Suffolk, what remedy?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I am a soldier, and unapt to weep,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or to exclaim on fortune's fickleness.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Yes, there is remedy enough, my lord:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Consent, and for thy honour give consent,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thy daughter shall be wedded to my king;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Whom I with pain have woo'd and won thereto;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And this her easy-held imprisonment
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Hath gained thy daughter princely liberty.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Speaks Suffolk as he thinks?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Fair Margaret knows
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That Suffolk doth not flatter, face, or feign.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Upon thy princely warrant, I descend
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To give thee answer of thy just demand.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And here I will expect thy coming.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Welcome, brave earl, into our territories:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Command in Anjou what your honour pleases.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thanks, Reignier, happy for so sweet a child,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Fit to be made companion with a king:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: What answer makes your grace unto my suit?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Since thou dost deign to woo her little worth
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To be the princely bride of such a lord;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Upon condition I may quietly
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Enjoy mine own, the country Maine and Anjou,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Free from oppression or the stroke of war,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: My daughter shall be Henry's, if he please.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That is her ransom; I deliver her;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And those two counties I will undertake
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Your grace shall well and quietly enjoy.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And I again, in Henry's royal name,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As deputy unto that gracious king,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Give thee her hand, for sign of plighted faith.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Reignier of France, I give thee kingly thanks,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Because this is in traffic of a king.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And yet, methinks, I could be well content
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To be mine own attorney in this case.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I'll over then to England with this news,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And make this marriage to be solemnized.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So farewell, Reignier: set this diamond safe
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: In golden palaces, as it becomes.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I do embrace thee, as I would embrace
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The Christian prince, King Henry, were he here.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Farewell, my lord: good wishes, praise and prayers
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Shall Suffolk ever have of Margaret.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Farewell, sweet madam: but hark you, Margaret;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: No princely commendations to my king?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Such commendations as becomes a maid,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A virgin and his servant, say to him.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Words sweetly placed and modestly directed.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But madam, I must trouble you again;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: No loving token to his majesty?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Yes, my good lord, a pure unspotted heart,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Never yet taint with love, I send the king.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And this withal.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That for thyself: I will not so presume
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To send such peevish tokens to a king.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O, wert thou for myself! But, Suffolk, stay;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thou mayst not wander in that labyrinth;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: There Minotaurs and ugly treasons lurk.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Solicit Henry with her wondrous praise:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Bethink thee on her virtues that surmount,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And natural graces that extinguish art;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Repeat their semblance often on the seas,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That, when thou comest to kneel at Henry's feet,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thou mayst bereave him of his wits with wonder.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Bring forth that sorceress condemn'd to burn.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Ah, Joan, this kills thy father's heart outright!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Have I sought every country far and near,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And, now it is my chance to find thee out,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Must I behold thy timeless cruel death?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Ah, Joan, sweet daughter Joan, I'll die with thee!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Decrepit miser! base ignoble wretch!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: I am descended of a gentler blood:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Thou art no father nor no friend of mine.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Out, out! My lords, an please you, 'tis not so;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: I did beget her, all the parish knows:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Her mother liveth yet, can testify
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: She was the first fruit of my bachelorship.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Graceless! wilt thou deny thy parentage?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: This argues what her kind of life hath been,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Wicked and vile; and so her death concludes.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Fie, Joan, that thou wilt be so obstacle!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: God knows thou art a collop of my flesh;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And for thy sake have I shed many a tear:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Deny me not, I prithee, gentle Joan.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Peasant, avaunt! You have suborn'd this man,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Of purpose to obscure my noble birth.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: 'Tis true, I gave a noble to the priest
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: The morn that I was wedded to her mother.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Kneel down and take my blessing, good my girl.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Wilt thou not stoop? Now cursed be the time
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Of thy nativity! I would the milk
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Thy mother gave thee when thou suck'dst her breast,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Had been a little ratsbane for thy sake!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Or else, when thou didst keep my lambs a-field,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: I wish some ravenous wolf had eaten thee!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Dost thou deny thy father, cursed drab?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: O, burn her, burn her! hanging is too good.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Take her away; for she hath lived too long,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: To fill the world with vicious qualities.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: First, let me tell you whom you have condemn'd:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Not me begotten of a shepherd swain,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: But issued from the progeny of kings;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Virtuous and holy; chosen from above,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: By inspiration of celestial grace,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: To work exceeding miracles on earth.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: I never had to do with wicked spirits:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: But you, that are polluted with your lusts,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Stain'd with the guiltless blood of innocents,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Corrupt and tainted with a thousand vices,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Because you want the grace that others have,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: You judge it straight a thing impossible
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: To compass wonders but by help of devils.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: No, misconceived! Joan of Arc hath been
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: A virgin from her tender infancy,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Chaste and immaculate in very thought;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Whose maiden blood, thus rigorously effused,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Will cry for vengeance at the gates of heaven.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Ay, ay: away with her to execution!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And hark ye, sirs; because she is a maid,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Spare for no faggots, let there be enow:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Place barrels of pitch upon the fatal stake,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: That so her torture may be shortened.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Will nothing turn your unrelenting hearts?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Then, Joan, discover thine infirmity,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: That warranteth by law to be thy privilege.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: I am with child, ye bloody homicides:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Murder not then the fruit within my womb,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Although ye hale me to a violent death.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Now heaven forfend! the holy maid with child!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: The greatest miracle that e'er ye wrought:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Is all your strict preciseness come to this?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: She and the Dauphin have been juggling:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: I did imagine what would be her refuge.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Well, go to; we'll have no bastards live;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Especially since Charles must father it.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: You are deceived; my child is none of his:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: It was Alencon that enjoy'd my love.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Alencon! that notorious Machiavel!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: It dies, an if it had a thousand lives.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: O, give me leave, I have deluded you:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: 'Twas neither Charles nor yet the duke I named,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: But Reignier, king of Naples, that prevail'd.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: A married man! that's most intolerable.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Why, here's a girl! I think she knows not well,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: There were so many, whom she may accuse.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: It's sign she hath been liberal and free.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And yet, forsooth, she is a virgin pure.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Strumpet, thy words condemn thy brat and thee:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Use no entreaty, for it is in vain.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Then lead me hence; with whom I leave my curse:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: May never glorious sun reflex his beams
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Upon the country where you make abode;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: But darkness and the gloomy shade of death
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Environ you, till mischief and despair
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Drive you to break your necks or hang yourselves!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Break thou in pieces and consume to ashes,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Thou foul accursed minister of hell!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Lord regent, I do greet your excellence
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: With letters of commission from the king.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: For know, my lords, the states of Christendom,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Moved with remorse of these outrageous broils,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Have earnestly implored a general peace
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Betwixt our nation and the aspiring French;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And here at hand the Dauphin and his train
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Approacheth, to confer about some matter.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Is all our travail turn'd to this effect?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: After the slaughter of so many peers,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: So many captains, gentlemen and soldiers,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: That in this quarrel have been overthrown
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And sold their bodies for their country's benefit,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Shall we at last conclude effeminate peace?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Have we not lost most part of all the towns,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: By treason, falsehood and by treachery,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Our great progenitors had conquered?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: O Warwick, Warwick! I foresee with grief
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: The utter loss of all the realm of France.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Be patient, York: if we conclude a peace,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: It shall be with such strict and severe covenants
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: As little shall the Frenchmen gain thereby.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Since, lords of England, it is thus agreed
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: That peaceful truce shall be proclaim'd in France,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: We come to be informed by yourselves
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: What the conditions of that league must be.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Speak, Winchester; for boiling choler chokes
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: The hollow passage of my poison'd voice,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: By sight of these our baleful enemies.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Charles, and the rest, it is enacted thus:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: That, in regard King Henry gives consent,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Of mere compassion and of lenity,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: To ease your country of distressful war,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And suffer you to breathe in fruitful peace,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: You shall become true liegemen to his crown:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And Charles, upon condition thou wilt swear
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: To pay him tribute, submit thyself,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Thou shalt be placed as viceroy under him,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And still enjoy thy regal dignity.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Must he be then as shadow of himself?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Adorn his temples with a coronet,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And yet, in substance and authority,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Retain but privilege of a private man?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: This proffer is absurd and reasonless.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: 'Tis known already that I am possess'd
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: With more than half the Gallian territories,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And therein reverenced for their lawful king:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Shall I, for lucre of the rest unvanquish'd,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Detract so much from that prerogative,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: As to be call'd but viceroy of the whole?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: No, lord ambassador, I'll rather keep
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: That which I have than, coveting for more,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Be cast from possibility of all.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Insulting Charles! hast thou by secret means
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Used intercession to obtain a league,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And, now the matter grows to compromise,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Stand'st thou aloof upon comparison?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Either accept the title thou usurp'st,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Of benefit proceeding from our king
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And not of any challenge of desert,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Or we will plague thee with incessant wars.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: My lord, you do not well in obstinacy
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: To cavil in the course of this contract:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: If once it be neglected, ten to one
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: We shall not find like opportunity.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: To say the truth, it is your policy
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: To save your subjects from such massacre
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And ruthless slaughters as are daily seen
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: By our proceeding in hostility;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: And therefore take this compact of a truce,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Although you break it when your pleasure serves.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: How say'st thou, Charles? shall our condition stand?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: It shall;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Only reserved, you claim no interest
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: In any of our towns of garrison.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Then swear allegiance to his majesty,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: As thou art knight, never to disobey
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Nor be rebellious to the crown of England,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Thou, nor thy nobles, to the crown of England.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: So, now dismiss your army when ye please:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Hang up your ensign, let your drums be still,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: For here we entertain a solemn peace.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE IV.  Camp of the YORK in Anjou.

line_text: Your wondrous rare description, noble earl,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Of beauteous Margaret hath astonish'd me:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Her virtues graced with external gifts
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Do breed love's settled passions in my heart:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And like as rigor of tempestuous gusts
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Provokes the mightiest hulk against the tide,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So am I driven by breath of her renown
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Either to suffer shipwreck or arrive
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Where I may have fruition of her love.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Tush, my good lord, this superficial tale
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Is but a preface of her worthy praise;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The chief perfections of that lovely dame
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Had I sufficient skill to utter them,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Would make a volume of enticing lines,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Able to ravish any dull conceit:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And, which is more, she is not so divine,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So full-replete with choice of all delights,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But with as humble lowliness of mind
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: She is content to be at your command;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Command, I mean, of virtuous chaste intents,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To love and honour Henry as her lord.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And otherwise will Henry ne'er presume.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Therefore, my lord protector, give consent
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That Margaret may be England's royal queen.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So should I give consent to flatter sin.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: You know, my lord, your highness is betroth'd
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Unto another lady of esteem:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: How shall we then dispense with that contract,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And not deface your honour with reproach?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As doth a ruler with unlawful oaths;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or one that, at a triumph having vow'd
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To try his strength, forsaketh yet the lists
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: By reason of his adversary's odds:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A poor earl's daughter is unequal odds,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And therefore may be broke without offence.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Why, what, I pray, is Margaret more than that?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Her father is no better than an earl,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Although in glorious titles he excel.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Yes, lord, her father is a king,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The King of Naples and Jerusalem;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And of such great authority in France
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As his alliance will confirm our peace
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And keep the Frenchmen in allegiance.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And so the Earl of Armagnac may do,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Because he is near kinsman unto Charles.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Beside, his wealth doth warrant a liberal dower,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Where Reignier sooner will receive than give.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A dower, my lords! disgrace not so your king,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That he should be so abject, base and poor,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To choose for wealth and not for perfect love.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Henry is able to enrich his queen
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And not seek a queen to make him rich:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So worthless peasants bargain for their wives,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As market-men for oxen, sheep, or horse.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Marriage is a matter of more worth
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Than to be dealt in by attorneyship;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Not whom we will, but whom his grace affects,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Must be companion of his nuptial bed:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And therefore, lords, since he affects her most,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: It most of all these reasons bindeth us,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: In our opinions she should be preferr'd.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For what is wedlock forced but a hell,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: An age of discord and continual strife?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Whereas the contrary bringeth bliss,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And is a pattern of celestial peace.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Whom should we match with Henry, being a king,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But Margaret, that is daughter to a king?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Her peerless feature, joined with her birth,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Approves her fit for none but for a king:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Her valiant courage and undaunted spirit,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: More than in women commonly is seen,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Will answer our hope in issue of a king;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For Henry, son unto a conqueror,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Is likely to beget more conquerors,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If with a lady of so high resolve
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As is fair Margaret he be link'd in love.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Then yield, my lords; and here conclude with me
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That Margaret shall be queen, and none but she.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Whether it be through force of your report,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: My noble Lord of Suffolk, or for that
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: My tender youth was never yet attaint
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: With any passion of inflaming love,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I cannot tell; but this I am assured,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I feel such sharp dissension in my breast,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Such fierce alarums both of hope and fear,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As I am sick with working of my thoughts.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Take, therefore, shipping; post, my lord, to France;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Agree to any covenants, and procure
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That Lady Margaret do vouchsafe to come
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To cross the seas to England and be crown'd
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: King Henry's faithful and anointed queen:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For your expenses and sufficient charge,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Among the people gather up a tenth.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Be gone, I say; for, till you do return,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I rest perplexed with a thousand cares.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And you, good uncle, banish all offence:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If you do censure me by what you were,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Not what you are, I know it will excuse
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: This sudden execution of my will.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And so, conduct me where, from company,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I may revolve and ruminate my grief.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Ay, grief, I fear me, both at first and last.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Thus Suffolk hath prevail'd; and thus he goes,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As did the youthful Paris once to Greece,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: With hope to find the like event in love,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But prosper better than the Trojan did.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Margaret shall now be queen, and rule the king;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But I will rule both her, the king and realm.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Sixth
